1.0.0.name: wordpress/poloray
1.0.0.description: Poloray is a flexible mobile friendly WordPress Theme. Poloray comes with a beautifully designed Homepage and Blog Template. The Theme had Widget Area in Sidebar and Footer. Poloray Theme is translation enabled and comes with a easy to use Themes Options Panel. Homepage can be setup quickly through setting details in the Options Panel. Theme also had a place for your Social Network Links and is very easy to setup and customize. Poloray Theme also allows you to insert your own Custom CSS to tweak the design easily according to your requirements. Theme is highly Search Engine Optimized and you will definitely enjoy using it.
